name: COCA
description: COCA is all-in-one Crypto App: multi-chain non-custodial wallet and debit cards, real-time crypto-to-fiat conversion, and cashback rewards. COCA enables payments with non-custodial COCA card linked to the user's wallet. The COCA card is issued globally (UK, EEA, APAC, LATAM) and accepted worldwide. COCA has no access to the funds and users retain full control at all times. Multi-Party Computation (MPC) provides additional security for the wallet compared to traditional crypto wallets with Private Key.
